name: Lorem ipsum dolor
description: Assess and identify which Linux virtual machines (VMs) are adaptable in the cloud. Determine and plan for your workload’s level of availability for new deployments. Monitor your applications running on Linux across the entire stack. Ensure your Linux VMs are secure and backed up. Govern your cloud environment with policy management best practices.
